name: No Dice (JHawk Studios)
description:
Due to the web version's lower frame-rate, it is recommended to use the downloadable version instead, however both work.

_______________________________________________________________________________________
A simple Infinite Runner where you are an escaped dice. Time your jumps using A S D on the corresponding indicators  to avoid flying projectiles.

Made in Two days for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

For a while now, I have been wanting to combine 2D and 3D art in a game, and after my first attempt at making a 2D dice, I decided that this was the perfect opportunity to give it a go.
